com.nordicid.nurapi

Class NurAuthenticateParam

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nordicid.nurapi.NurAuthenticateParam

  • public class NurAuthenticateParam
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int csi
      Cryptographic Suite Indicator.
      int msgBitLength
      The CSI message's length in bits.
      int preTxWait
      Additional wait time before executing the command in microseconds (0...50000); may be used to energize the tag properly (carrier is on).
      boolean reSelect
      If module needs to internally use the ReadBuffer command then setting this to TRUE causes the tag to be re-selected between operations.
      boolean rxAttn
      RX attenuation for response reception; causes "write-like" operation thus reduces operation's range.
      int rxLength
      Set to 0 if reception length is not known, otherwise this is the bit length of the reception ranging in 1...1008.
      int timeout
      Response timeout similar to read or write; unit is milliseconds ranging from 20...50.

    • Constructor Summary

      NurAuthenticateParam()
      Basic constructor with nothing specific set up yet.
      NurAuthenticateParam(NurAuthenticateParam other)
      Constructor that copies parameters from another object.

    • Field Detail

      • csi

        public int csi
        Cryptographic Suite Indicator.

      • rxLength

        public int rxLength
        Set to 0 if reception length is not known, otherwise this is the bit length of the reception ranging in 1...1008.

      • rxAttn

        public boolean rxAttn
        RX attenuation for response reception; causes "write-like" operation thus reduces operation's range.

      • reSelect

        public boolean reSelect
        If module needs to internally use the ReadBuffer command then setting this to TRUE causes the tag to be re-selected between operations.

      • timeout

        public int timeout
        Response timeout similar to read or write; unit is milliseconds ranging from 20...50.

      • preTxWait

        public int preTxWait
        Additional wait time before executing the command in microseconds (0...50000); may be used to energize the tag properly (carrier is on).

      • msgBitLength

        public int msgBitLength
        The CSI message's length in bits.

        Constructor that copies parameters from another object.
        Parameters:
        other - The authentication parameters to copy from.

    • Method Detail

      • setMessage

        public void setMessage(int msgBitLen,
                       byte[] message)
                throws NurApiException
        Set up the message required by the used CSI.
        Parameters:
        msgBitLen - Bit length of the message.
        message - Message contents as byte array.
        Throws:
        NurApiException - Exception is thrown if the message is null or there is a bit length mismatch to the message contents.

      • getMessage

        public byte[] getMessage()
                  throws NurApiException
        Get the current message from the class.
        Returns:
        If OK, returns the copy of the currently set up message.
        Throws:
        NurApiException - Exception is thrown if the current set message bit length is less than 1 or more than { @link #com.nordicid.nurapi.GEN2V2_MAX_AUTHBITS }.
